February 11-12, 2016

Chicago, IL

SelectUSA at Investment Consulting Associatesâ€™ FDI Seminar

Investment Consulting Associates (ICA), in partnership with Conway Events, is organizing a two-day workshop seminar in Chicago on February 11 and 12. The FDI Training Seminar will focus on FDI attraction strategies for economic developers and investment promotion organizations. During the second day of the event, SelectUSA Investment Specialist Alev Gunay will speak during a session on marketing your location internationally.

For more information about the event and our role in it, please contact Alev Gunay (alev.gunay@trade.gov).
